decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - The development shall be begun not later than three years from the date of Planning Permission numbered P/1500/21 dated 26/11/2021.

REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of Section 92 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).
Condition : 2 - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and documents:
9PR-101 Rev: B; 9PR-102 Rev:  B; 9PR-103 Rev: B; 9PR-104 Rev: C; 9PR-105 Rev: B.
REASON: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.

Condition : 3 - Prior to occupation of the development hereby permitted, the fire safety measures shall be implemented in accordance with the approved Fire Safety Statement in application reference: P/3963/22 dated 03/07/2023 and the fire safety measures outlined for the development shall be carried out and retained in accordance with the statement so agreed. ï¿½ 
REASON: To ensure that the fire safety of the proposed building is managed in a satisfactory manner and that the development contributes to fire safety in line with Policy D12A of the London Plan (2021). To ensure appropriate fire safety measures are approved before development commences on site. 
Condition : 4 - Prior to occupation of the development hereby permitted, a Car Parking Design and Management Plan shall be implemented in accordance with the approved Car Parking Design and Management Plan in application reference: P/3963/22 dated 03/07/2023 and the parking measures and operation outlined for the development shall be carried out and retained in accordance with the plan so agreed. 

REASON: To ensure that the car parking is managed in a satisfactory manner and that the development contributes to more sustainable travel in accordance with Local Plan DM42 of the Harrow Development Management Polices Local Plan (2013) and Policy T6 of the London Plan (2021); and  ensure an appropriate car park design is approved before development commences.
Condition : 5 - Prior to the occupation of the development hereby permitted, the external materials shall be implemented in accordance with the approved materials in application reference: P/3963/22 dated 03/07/2023 and shall thereafter be retained. 

REASON: To enhance the appearance of the development and safeguard the  character and appearance of the area.
Condition : 6 - Prior to occupation of the development hereby permitted, the construction works shall be implemented in accordance with the approved demolition and construction logistics plan in application reference: P/3963/22 dated 03/07/2023 and the demolition and construction of the development shall be carried out and retained in accordance with the plan so agreed. 
REASON: To minimise the impacts of construction upon the amenities of neighbouring occupiers and to ensure that development does not adversely affect safety on the transport network in accordance with policies DM1 and DM43 of the Harrow Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013). 
Condition : 7 - Prior to completion or occupation of the development hereby approved, details of 2 x secure bicycle parking spaces, shall be provided and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. These details shall include the types and dimensions of cycle storage. These shall be implemented on site and shall thereafter be retained and made available for the use of future occupiers of the development.

REASON: To ensure that adequate cycle parking provision is made for more sustainable transport modes on the site.
Condition : 8 - Notwithstanding the provisions of Part 3 of Schedule 2 of The Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015, (or any order revoking or re-enacting that order with or without modification), no development than would otherwise be permitted by that part of the Order (or the equivalent provisions of any replacement Order) shall be carried out without planning permission having first been obtained from the local planning authority.

REASON: To safeguard the business use of the proposed development and vitality of the area.
Condition : 9 - The premises shall only be used for the purpose as set out in the application (B2 Light Industrial) and for no other purpose, including any other purpose in Class PA of the Schedule to the Town and Country Planning (Use Classes) Order 2020 (or in any provision equivalent to that class in any statutory instrument revoking and re-enacting that order with or with or without modification.

REASON:  To safeguard the amenity of the neighbouring residents and the character of the locality and in the interest of highway safety in accordance with polices DM 1 and DM 42 of the Harrow Development Management Polices Local Plan (2013).
description: Variation of condition 2 (approved plans) attached to planning permission P/1500/21 dated 26/11/2021 to allow an increase of height of the building by 2.3m
